statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -10 \\ -11 \\ -5 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 10 \\ 19 \\ 15 \\ -21 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
